metadata.title: USN-4033-1 -- libmysofa vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that a libmysofa component does not properly validate multiplications and additions, and may crash with some specific input.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4033-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 libmysofa-dev - 0.6~dfsg0-2ubuntu0.18.04.1 No subscription required
